data.value: : is a conceptual framework used to standardize and facilitate the repsosibilites of network devices and applications, it does so by spreading the responsibilties across 7 layers.
Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
: Develop and maintain standards of networking technologies ensuring interopablitly and compatitbiltiy among different devices and vendors.
e.g standards include: Ethernet (IEEE 802.3) and Wifi (IEEE 802.11)
